productDetail.title: Modern Bathroom
productDetail.description: A stylish modern bathroom with contemporary fixtures.

productDetail.title: Modern Kitchen
productDetail.description: A stylish modern kitchen with contemporary fixtures.
additionalText: Step into our minimalist living area, where simplicity meets elegance.
This space is designed to promote relaxation and clarity, with clean lines and a neutral color palette.
The uncluttered layout features multifunctional furniture, ensuring that every piece serves a purpose.
Natural light floods the room through large, unobstructed windows, highlighting the beauty of the carefully chosen decor.
Soft, muted tones and natural materials create a warm and inviting atmosphere, making it the perfect place to unwind and find peace.

productDetail.title: Living Area Classic 3
productDetail.description: A timeless classic living area with luxurious materials and furnishings.
additionalText: Welcome to the Living Area Classic 3, where timeless elegance and comfort converge.
This room is adorned with rich, luxurious materials and classic furnishings that evoke a sense of grandeur.
The warm color palette, featuring deep wood tones and plush fabrics, creates an inviting and cozy ambiance.
Traditional elements, such as ornate moldings and a grand fireplace, blend seamlessly with modern comforts, providing a perfect balance of style and functionality.
This space is designed for both relaxation and entertaining, making it an ideal gathering place for family and friends.

productDetail.title: Modern Bathroom
description: Experience the serene elegance of our minimalist
bathroom design. Sleek, clean lines define
the space, with a focus on functionality and
subtle luxury. The crisp white tiles and modern
fixtures create a calming atmosphere, perfect
for unwinding after a long day. The floating
vanity and frameless glass shower add to the
uncluttered aesthetic, ensuring that every element
serves both form and function.

productDetail.title: Classic Living Area
description: Welcome to the Living Area Classic 2, where timeless elegance and comfort converge.
This room is adorned with rich, luxurious materials and classic furnishings that evoke a sense of grandeur.
The warm color palette, featuring deep wood tones and plush fabrics, creates an inviting and cozy ambiance.
Traditional elements, such as ornate moldings and a grand fireplace, blend seamlessly with modern comforts, providing a perfect balance of style and functionality.
This space is designed for both relaxation and entertaining, making it an ideal gathering place for family and friends.

productDetail.title: Minimalist Living Area
description: Step into our minimalist living area, where simplicity meets elegance.
This space is designed to promote relaxation and clarity, with clean lines and a neutral color palette.
The uncluttered layout features multifunctional furniture, ensuring that every piece serves a purpose.
Natural light floods the room through large, unobstructed windows, highlighting the beauty of the carefully chosen decor.
Soft, muted tones and natural materials create a warm and inviting atmosphere, making it the perfect place to unwind and find peace.
